pages.text: Your rituals require more than simply the correct arrangement of blocks and Sigils. An effort of will is required to open a channel from your Soul Network to the ritual, and The $(item)Activation Crystal$() will allow you to focus yourself enough to activate your rituals.

pages.heading: Weak Activation Crystal
pages.text: Simply press [$(k:use)] with a bound Activation Crystal on a Master Ritual Stone to activate the ritual it's part of - assuming it's suitably assembled, that is.
